channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [FLINK-22180] RM reclaims slots while batch job is in progress

item.summary: RM reclaims slots while batch job is in progress

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: I've marked this as a blocker for the time being because I have a suspicion that FLINK-21751 introduced a regression where the RM might reclaim slots while they are being offered to (and subsequently acceptedby ) the JM.
Re-opening because it appears to be a separate issue from FLINK-21859,, that shows similar symptoms.
